definition: water flea (small crustacean of genus Daphnia)
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Thanksgiving flowers and plants water flea, Thanksgiving suffering adversity.
sentences.chinese: 感恩花草魚蟲，感恩苦難逆境。

sentences.english: A buyers inspects a cricket at the Shanghai market before making a purchase by stroking it with a thin piece of straw to see how aggressive it is.
sentences.chinese: 上海花鳥魚蟲市場上的蟋蟀。

sentences.english: It was the gathering Cangzhou bird fleas.
sentences.chinese: 那是滄州花鳥魚蟲的聚集地。

sentences.english: A merchant at the Shanghai market.
sentences.chinese: 上海花鳥魚蟲市場上的一位賣家。

definition: to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
lit. paper has become expensive in Luoyang (because everyone is making a copy of a popular story) (idiom)/fig. (of a product) to sell like hotcakes
to spend the whole day eating (i.e. not doing any work)
to have bright eyes and white teeth
